titles.title: A bill to designate Venezuela under section 244 of the Immigration and Nationality Act to permit nationals of Venezuela to be eligible for temporary protected status under such section and to strengthen internal migration systems in countries surrounding Venezuela.
Venezuela TPS Act of 2018
Venezuela TPS Act of 2018
Venezuela TPS Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary:
Venezuela TPS Act of 2018
This bill addresses the migration of Venezuelan nationals by permitting them to qualify for temporary protected status, which prevents their removal from the United States and allows them to obtain employment and travel authorization. The bill also provides assistance to the migration systems of nations surrounding Venezuela.
